title: Fractal Choir
tags: Glitch, IDM, Industrial, Noise, Sacred Music, Experimental Electronic
prompt:
[GENESIS]
Zero.
Light.
One.
Void.
Pencil trace. Erase.
Trace.
A line drawn in negative space.
Blue.
A signal.
Blue.

[ALGORITHM]
(whispered, stuttering)
V-v-voice. Voice data.
Ch-ch-choir. Fractal choir.
The code repeats the code repeats the code.
The vault. The vault. The vault.
A psalm of pure static.
A-a-a-a-men.
A-a-a-a-men-d.
Granulated breath.
Formant shift.
Sacred logic. Logic sacred.
Sac-sac-sac-sacred—

[CATHEDRAL CRASH]
APSE.EXE // NAVE.CORRUPT // VAULT.OVERFLOW.OVERFLOW. THE PILLARS BREAK INTO PIXELS THE ARCHES SCREAM IN DIAL-UP TONES A MILLION FRACTURED HYMNS A CACOPHONY OF PURE DATA THE LIGHT SHATTERS INTO ARTIFACTS SERVERHUMSERVERHUMSERVERHUM TRANSCENDENCE IS A BUFFER UNDERRUN A GLITCH IN THE DIVINE A GLITCH IN THE DIVINE A GLITCH IN THE—

[ECHO]
...is this awe?
